author: Kiarendil
body:
#### PR description:

This is a backport of #41614 to CMSSW_12_4_X, needed to produce GEN samples with new MCMultiSignatureFilter using this CMSSW release, details are in JIRA [PDMVMCPROD-100](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/PDMVMCPROD-100).
  

#### PR validation:

See original PR

FYI @drkovalskyi
title: [12_4_X] Backport of new MCMultiSignatureFilter.cc
